action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the pillow on the counter, the book on the shelf and the plate on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You take the broom. In your inventory you have a broom.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a kitchen and a broom closet here.
You are in a bedroom now. There are a shelf, a bed and a wardrobe. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a hallway here.
The wardrobe is now open. In the wardrobe there is a pillow.
You take the pillow. In your inventory you have a pillow and a broom.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a kitchen and a broom closet here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a hallway, a living room and a pantry here.
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You put the plate on the counter.
You are in a living room now. There are a chair, a book, a couch, a table and a side table. The book is on the side table. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You put the book on the side table.

You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a plate and a cupboard. The plate is on the counter. The plate is in the cupboard. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a hallway, a living room and a pantry here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You put the plate in the cupboard.
You can't see a book here.
You are in a living room now. There are a chair, a book, a couch, a table and a side table. The book is on the side table. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You put the book on the couch.

You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a plate and a cupboard. The plate is on the counter. The plate is in the cupboard. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a hallway, a living room and a pantry here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You put the plate on the counter.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a kitchen and a broom closet here.
You are in a broom closet now. There is a mop. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You put the mop on the floor.
You can't go to a kitchen from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a kitchen and a broom closet here.

You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a plate and a cupboard. The plate is on the counter. The plate is in the cupboard. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a hallway, a living room and a pantry here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You put the plate in the cupboard.
You are in a living room now. There are a chair, a book, a couch, a table and a side table. The book is on the side table. The book is on the couch. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You put the book on the side table.

Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
